title: Boti: Byteland Overclocked
description:
Play as Boti, a data robot sent into the computer world of Byteland to rid it of bugs, viruses, and glitches. Take on a world full of advanced automation and computing processes brought colorfully to life. Use your powers to solve puzzles, fight digital threats and conquer complex platforming sections. Fear & Hunger
Boti: Byteland Overclocked combines classic 3D platforming with a splash of innovation. Double jump, dash, hover, and glide through vibrant levels, discovering fantastic combos inspired by a world of robots, computers, and technology.
Enjoy gaming together with the seamless drop-in, drop-out co-operative mode. Embark on your quest to save Byteland alone or with a friend whenever you want with gameplay that seamlessly adapts between solo and two-players at any point in the game.
